title: About Books: Pamela Paul, New York Times Book Review Editor
description:
A conversation with New York Times Book Review Editor Pamela Paul about her latest book, 100 Things We've Lost to the Internet, and some of the notable books of the year. A note: listen to our next episode on January 7, 2022.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
